message: SMOKING GUN: The task was created WITHOUT client_cwd parameter! When create_real_task() is called without client_cwd, it stores null in the registry. Then deploy_headless_agent() reads null, falls back to extracting from workspace path, but the workspace is in the project dir so it works... EXCEPT the MCP client is NOT passing client_cwd when creating tasks. The MCP client must be updated to pass client_cwd=os.getcwd() when calling create_real_task().

data.root_cause: MCP client does not pass client_cwd parameter
data.fix_location: MCP client code that calls create_real_task()
data.required_change: Add client_cwd parameter to create_real_task() call
